description_txt: stated on May 22, 2013 in A gubernatorial campaign television ad:
quote_txt: "Jon Corzine, elected governor. Teams up with Barbara Buono. $1.2  billion sales tax increase? Passed. Most spending in state history? Passed. After Buono named budget chair, taxes and fees increase 23 times in just two years. State debt? Up $13.4 billion. Unemployment? Doubled."

description_txt: stated on May 19, 2013 in an appearance on "10 News Conference":
